reviews.review_text: Salad was great, ambience was nice but could have been more clean. The floor needs retouch as it looks bit odd on such a beautiful surrounding. Also a music can add magical touch to the small place. Seats are less but nicely placed in such a tight space. Didn't get the logic behind why they need kitchen that big up there since they serve nothing but just salads. The boards on the wall are quite informative and the menu card is 10/10. I will recommend this place if you are really health conscious and don't mind spending few extra bucks to enjoy some really nice salads.

To everyone who thinks salads are boring or not tasty, You got to try this place! And Iâ€™m sure youâ€™ll fall for the salads hereðŸ¤¤
Veg and non veg options are available and both are equally delicious! Also each salad here tastes different.
Loved the ACE ( Arugula chicken egg) Its really an Ace! And my favourite in non-vegetarian options

The spring surprise here is a must try its one of the best vegetarian options I must say
And also not forgetting the refreshing pear and flaxseed salad.

The portions are great! If your new year resolution to get off those flabs too then you need to head here soon!

Simply salads is literally a place worth the price,  they offer such delicious salads with a lip smacking taste. The place is small and cozy. They don't have much beverage options but the variety of salads covers up. It's not pure veg.  They add egg, chicken and alot more that fills up your stomach and also makes you crave for more.  The most healthy option. It's situated in panjim close to caculo mall, it's location makes it easily accessible to the office crowd as well as a hangout junction for the health obsessed college kids.
